en.purpose: To assess if any of the criteria are present to diagnose acute MI in patients with prior LBBB.
en.use:
Use to assess if any of the criteria are present to diagnose acute MI in patients with prior LBBB.

The following criteria are assessed:
- ST-segment elevation >=1mm and concordant with QRS complex
- ST-segment depression <=1mm in lead V1, V2 or V3
- ST elevation at the J-point, relative to QRS onset, is at least 1 mm and has an amplitude at least 25% of the preceding S-wave

Modified Sgarbossa's criteria are met if any criteria are positive.
en.misuse: Shall not be used in patients without prior LBBB.

other_details.references: Smith SW, Dodd KW, Henry TD, Dvorak DM, Pearce LA. Diagnosis of ST-elevation myocardial infarction in the presence of left bundle branch block with the ST-elevation to S-wave ratio in a modified Sgarbossa rule. Ann Emerg Med. 2012 Dec;60(6):766-76. doi: 10.1016/j.annemergmed.2012.07.119. Epub 2012 Aug 31. Erratum in: Ann Emerg Med. 2013 Oct;62(4):302. PMID: 22939607.

when: $gt0005|ST-segment elevation >=1mm and concordant with QRS complex|==local::at0008|Present|
$gt0006|ST-segment depression <=1mm in lead V1, V2 or V3|==local::at0008|Present|
$gt0007|ST elevation at the J-point, relative to QRS onset, is at least 1 mm and has an amplitude at least 25% of the preceding S-wave|==local::at0008|Present|
$gt0005|ST-segment elevation >=1mm and concordant with QRS complex|==local::at0009|Absent|
$gt0006|ST-segment depression <=1mm in lead V1, V2 or V3|==local::at0009|Absent|
$gt0007|ST elevation at the J-point, relative to QRS onset, is at least 1 mm and has an amplitude at least 25% of the preceding S-wave|==local::at0009|Absent|

gt0001.text: Modified Sgarbossa's crteria for MI in Left Bundle Branch Block
gt0001.description: Criteria used to diagnose acute MI in patients with prior LBBB.

gt0005.text: ST-segment elevation >=1mm and concordant with QRS complex

gt0006.text: ST-segment depression <=1mm in lead V1, V2 or V3

gt0007.text: ST elevation at the J-point, relative to QRS onset, is at least 1 mm and has an amplitude at least 25% of the preceding S-wave

gt0027.text: Set first criteria to met yes

gt0028.text: Set second criteria to met yes

gt0029.text: Set third criteria to met yes
